details.description:
Gorgeous 1.5 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains. The apartment features: Hardwood floors, Spacious et-in style kitchen with stainless steel appliances, Large living room, 1 queen size and 1 twin size bedroom. Heat; Hot Water is included and there is rooftop access.
Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
June 1 move in Small pets OK No broker fee

Beautiful Williamsburg apartment is available June 1st!
- 2 very equal and BIG queen sized bedrooms - Real living room that fits a sofa /tv/coffee table and has natural light - Separate kitchen with full sized appliances
ELEVATOR BUILDING!
Because this property is in a prime location, you will be conveniently close to the J, M, and G trains! You?ll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby?s All Right, Patrizia?s, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold.

details.description:
Large 2BR with queen size rooms, large balcony and huge PRIVATE roof deck and private balcony. Common area big enough for a couch, tv and dining table. The unit features stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and microwave, hardwood floor, white tile kitchen backsplash and bathroom, individual a/c units in each room. Spiral staircase to a small room which opens to your own private roof deck. The building features an elevator, laundry room, roof deck, zip car, security system, and is located in the center of Bushwick!
Building also features 2 large shared roof decks and a laundry room. Parking and zip car services available. Elevator
1/2 a block from the Dekalb L and 5min walk to the M train. NO fee
Call or text to take a look right away!

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Private Roof Deck

2br / 1bath with laundry in the building and roof deck! Huge windows in the bedrooms (south facing) Cutout window to bring more light into the large living room Butcher block countertops Hardwood floors Dishwasher Microwave Roof deck Laundry in the building Faces away from the street

details.description:
2 Bed CORNER UNIT Penthouse with amazing views ready for immediate move in!
Please see video on StreetEasy ad or send message and I?ll send to you!
Unit features: Hardwood floors Vaulted ceiling Gas fireplace Top floor of elevator building. 2 elevator bays make sure you never have to wait! Corner apartment with TONs of natural light Kitchen island perfect for setting up stools for dining Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Efficient PTAC heat and cooling unit for all rooms Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closets
Building features: Affordable parking spots available ButterflyMX intercom Multiple laundry rooms Huge Roof deck with spectacular skyline views Zipcars available Bike storage Go lockers for secure package delivery State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
Pets ok NO FEE! Just 1st and security to move in! Guarantors welcome. $20 app fee per person
Call or text to view the right away. This is priced to GO!

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors, Central A/C

details.description:
Welcome to Casa Hope Williamsburg?s new luxury development!
Sunny units with oversized windows throughout, and gorgeous finishes Steps from the L / G trains, commute to Union Square in only 13 minutes door to door!
Tons of building amenities:
Fitness center Rooftop terrace Business center On-site garage parking Lounge on 7th floor Mini lounge nook to each floor Elevator Bike room Parking garage (additional fee)
The kitchen comes equipped with brand new stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. Gorgeous well-designed light wood cabinetry, white stone countertops and backsplashes. Modern bathrooms feature a deep soaking spa bathtub, as well as modern vanity with oversized mirror, storage cabinet space and matte black finishes. Other features include oak flooring throughout and generous closet space. Trash Chute to each floor.
Perfect location with an easy commute to the city and tons of restaurants, bars and cafes nearby Short walk from McCarren Park and the Bedford L train area

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Refrigerator/oven, Central A/C, Stainless steel appliances, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description:
77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances, Central A/C

details.description:
No Fee ? Renovated 2 Bedroom in Bed-Stuy
This full-floor 2 bed / 1 bath apartment sits on a beautiful tree-lined block in Bedford-Stuyvesant, just around the corner from Herbert Von King Park. The layout offers great separation between bedrooms, making it perfect for sharing or working from home.
Features include:
Sunny living area with oversized windows
Two full-sized bedrooms with closets
Updated kitchen with marble counters, stainless steel appliances, wine fridge, and French-door refrigerator
In-unit washer and dryer
Modern bathroom with sleek tile
Central air and heat
Hardwood floors throughout
Pets welcome
No broker fee. Guarantors accepted. Income and credit check required.

amenities.other: Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description:
This building is arguably THE MOST desirable neighborhood in Brooklyn. Right on the Williamsburg Waterfront with gorgeous river and city views, all the restaurants, coffee shops, bars, art and music venues, plant shops, parks, farmers markets, grocers, and absolutely anything and everything else you could desire right outside your door. Be warned: the luxury experience you are offered inside the building may leave you feeling torn about whether to go out and enjoy the bustle of the neighborhood or stay in and enjoy your own amenities right here at home!Conveniently located off the J. M, and L trains, as well as the B32, B62, and Q59 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher Central A/C and Heat Private Balcony Excellent light from extra large windows
BUILDING FEATURES: Bike Room Courtyard Elevator Fitness Center Laundry Room Tenant Lounge Package Room Finished Roof Deck First; Security NO FEE

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Central A/C, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Private Outdoor Space, Roof Access, Shared Outdoor Space, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description:
Prime Crown Heights Living at 1499 Bedford Ave!
Discover the epitome of modern living at 1499 Bedford Ave, a new building in the heart of Crown Heights. Located steps from Eastern Parkway and multiple subway lines, and within walking distance of Grand Army Plaza, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park, this residence offers unparalleled convenience and vibrant city life.
Building Amenities:
State-of-the-art fitness room Pet wash station Laundry facilities (in-unit laundry in some units) Social lounge with game room Furnished rooftop with panoramic city views Second-floor public terrace Open workstations Dedicated mail room
Unit Features: Private terraces and balconies in select units Kitchen islands in select units Large windows with abundant natural light Stunning views of NYC skyline, Prospect Park, and neighborhood streets
Welcome to 1499 Bedford Ave?where luxury, community, and convenience meet. Experience the best of Crown Heights living.

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace

details.description:
Built-in 2019, You?ll enjoy a generously-spaced 2-bed apartment, in the beautiful neighborhood of Astoria, yeah, green space and good bites, for days!
You?ll enjoy a super sun-lit 2 bedroom unit that can each room comfortably fit a queen-sized bed, dresser, tall wardrobe, make it your studio or even home gym or playroom for a little-one.
Make dinner without, having to clear your workspace all the time, and having a pet to help keep you company! After dinner, take a stroll through the neighborhood and check out everything.
Lucky for you you?re nestled on a residential block, close to shops, stores, and Transportation options are the N/Q at Broadway, and R/M at Steinway, an estimated 20 min. to Midtown? for those who commute.

details.description:
Elevated Living at 527 Grand Ave in Prospect Heights
2 bedroom with 2 bath
Welcome to 527 Grand Ave, a luxury community perfectly nestled in the vibrant Prospect Heights neighborhood. Offering 1 and 2 bedroom residences with spacious layouts, premium finishes, and thoughtful design, this property redefines modern living. Tons of natural sunlight throughout.
Residents enjoy unparalleled amenities, including: - A state-of-the-art fitness center - Expansive rooftop terrace with stunning skyline views - Dedicated children?s playroom - Business conference room for remote work and meetings - Convenient elevator access
Neighborhood Highlights: Prospect Heights is a blend of historic charm and contemporary culture. Stroll down tree-lined streets to uncover trendy restaurants, cozy cafes, and boutique shops. The iconic Prospect Park, Brooklyn Botanic Garden, and Brooklyn Museum are just steps away, offering lush green spaces and endless cultural experiences. Excellent transit options, including the A and C trains, make commuting to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn a breeze.
Live where convenience meets character. Schedule your tour today and make 527 Grand Ave your new home!

amenities.other: A/C, Central A/C, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Stainless steel appliances, Hardwood Floors, Dishwasher

details.description:
Welcome to 654 Madison St, one of Bed-Stuy?s most luxurious apartment buildings! This No Fee 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom unit offers a blend of modern comfort and convenience.
Apartment Features:
Bright and modern bedrooms Fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances Dishwasher for added convenience Individual AC units in each room Large windows allowing plenty of natural light Elegant hardwood floors High ceilings creating an airy atmosphere Extra closet space for storage Virtual doorman for enhanced security
Building Amenities:
Spacious gym for residents? use Two lounges for relaxation or socializing Furnished rooftop with panoramic views Elevator for easy access Laundry room for added convenience Bike room for storage Pet spa for your furry friends Parking available (additional fee) Pet-friendly community
Location and Transportation:
Proximity to J train at Kosciusko St stop, A and C trains at Utica Av, and M train at Myrtle Ave. Easy access to Manhattan in under 35 minutes! Close to great bars, coffee shops, and restaurants for entertainment and dining options.
Additional Information:
?Personal guarantors are welcome ? no guarantor services or 3rd party guarantors allowed . ?Pets are allowed ?Don?t miss the opportunity to experience luxury living in Bed-Stuy.

Luxury 2-Bedroom, 2-Bath Apartment in Prime Astoria!
Step into this stunning 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment in the heart of Astoria, offering a perfect blend of modern comfort and convenience. Featuring hardwood floors throughout, this spacious home boasts a sleek kitchen with stainless steel appliances, ideal for cooking and entertaining. Enjoy the comfort of central AC and the convenience of a doorman building, ensuring security and concierge services. Located in a vibrant neighborhood, you?ll be close to top restaurants, caf?s, parks, and easy subway access to Manhattan. Don't miss this exceptional home!
